charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) Possess with intent to distribute a mixture containing a detectable quantity of marijuana, a Schedule I controlled substance (INDICTMENT FILED 8/11/04)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Term of Imprisonment: 36 months. The Court will allow the defendant to voluntarily surrender to the desgnated Bureau of Prisons facility, however, said surrender date will not occur within three (3) months of today's date of June 6, 2005; Term of Supervised Release: 3 years, with standard and special conditions of release; Special Assessment: $100.00
